title: looking489991
author: looking489991
content: CHATGPT4 Killer is here. Revolutionary Text to Video AI Generator. Create stunning, ultra realistic AI generated videos from text prompt. Work with all sectors and industries. The breakthrough is here. The Zartum Protocol text-to-video AI ecosystem works by taking a textual input and generating a video output that corresponds to the input. The process begins with the NLP model, which processes the textual input and generates a storyboard outlining the visual elements of the video.WEBSITE: https://zartumprotocol.tech/Telegram: https://t.me/zartumprotocolTwitter: https://twitter.com/zartumprotocolPROMO DEMO VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rd4zaaGs1gA

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: looking489991 on March 29, 2023, 01:29:13 PMCHATGPT4 Killer is here. Revolutionary Text to Video AI Generator. ~Yeah right... Except for the fact that it's a complete sham. I mean, who needs AI-generated footage when you can just slap together some random clips from various sources, right? Prompt: "Colorful aliens skydiving above island"Shows stock footage of Wingsuit Flying over the Maldives Islands: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I6VpZ3bnnKIPrompt: "Parrot eating on the tree"Shows stock footage of a bird on a tree branch eating: https://videohive.net/item/a-wild-turquoise-fronted-amazon-bird-amazona-aestiva-perched-on-chinaberry-tree-eating-melia-azed/37132960So, your so-called "revolutionary text to video AI generator" is nothing more than a cheap and dishonest trick.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Your team is also AI generated or something? Not only their "real" photo is cartoonized, they don't even have name or background profile that could help us know them better. Your whietepaper... well, litepaper, also didn't cover anything about this or other important details.It also came to my awareness that you previously raised two projects, one far back in 2018 and one only last year, which no longer accessible today.

comments.author: kosudrag
comments.body: Another AI shit...Crypto is great, but I really feel like sick anymore. We dive in defi and they brought a lot of garbage defi project on us. Walking/Running shits still turning around us...Now AI projects keep coming.Really nonsense.
